pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Chemical-resistant gloves made of any waterproof material; Shoes and socks.

Safety_Information.general_Info: Harmful if absorbed through skin. Avoid contact with skin, eyes or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet. Remove and wash contaminated clothing before reuse.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for ___ minutes. Take off contaminated clothing. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: This product is a pyrethroid. If large amounts have been ingested, milk, cream and other digestible fats and oils may increase absorption and so should be avoided.
